fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
During the full moon you may choose to use a relic on somebody.

Using a relic on a coven member will grant them Powerful defence and Investigation Immunity.

Using a relic on a non-coven member will remove their Defence and Roleblock them.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You may not use a relic on yourself.

With the Necronomicon the relic will deal a basic attack on a non-coven member.
